other_tests.findings: Remarkably increased MIBI uptake in the hyperplastic lesion in early imaging and no extinction of the uptake in delayed imaging.
Confirmed as primary parathyroid hyperplasia, mesoplasts were rotundate or ovate, and cytoplasms were slightly eosinophilic.
other_tests.changes_over_time: On the second day after the parathyroidectomy, the blood calcium level was 2.0 mmol/L and the blood parathyroid hormone level was 304.0 pg/mL, both significantly lower than before the procedure.
